txt.en: Deliver the dwarf-helmets, dwarf-shields, and dwarf-swords to Thorin at Amdân
Thorin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have collected a great deal of arms and armour from the fallen. You should deliver them to Thorin at Amdân.

'Many of our kin lay dead beneath the eyes of Durin's Stone, but I would not allow them to be defiled and dishonoured. The Orcs pick at the dead, pilfering arms and armour wrought by the skilled hands of our ancestors. Nay! Not just those of Durin's Folk, but of all Seven Houses!\n\n'I ask that you gather helmets, shields, and swords from our fallen brethren that they do not fall into the hands of Azog and his Orcs.'
'Our brethren must not be forgotten, my friend. We must honour their deeds and sacrifice through all days to come!'
Dwarf-corpses litter the battlefield around Durin's Stone. Their arms and armour must not fall into the hands of the Orcs.
Fallen dwarves can be found at Durin's Stone.\n\nYou should collect arms and armour from fallen dwarves at Azanulbizar.
